actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on International Security and Scientific Affairs.
Executive Comment Requested from Arms Control & Disarm Agcy, State, DOD.
Executive Comment Received From Arms Control & Disarm Agcy.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on International Security and Scientific Affairs

official_title: A joint resolution to express the sense of the Congress that the President should immediately resume negotiations with the Soviet Union and Great Britain on a comprehensive treaty to end the testing of nuclear weapons, and that the President should seek to include in the negotiations all other nuclear and non-nuclear weapons nations.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the President should resume negotiations with the Soviet Union and Great Britain on a comprehensive treaty to end the testing of nuclear weapons.

titles.title: A joint resolution to express the sense of the Congress that the President should immediately resume negotiations with the Soviet Union and Great Britain on a comprehensive treaty to end the testing of nuclear weapons, and that the President should seek to include in the negotiations all other nuclear and non-nuclear weapons nations.
